seo.title: Launch Your AI Course Store in Minutes
seo.description: Pick your courses, we build the store. Conversion-ready pages, SEO best practices, and instant checkout links.

hero.headline: High-converting AI courses, ready to sell
hero.subhead: Choose up to 3 to start (Starter) or unlock the full catalog (Pro). Pages are auto-written and SEO-ready.

features.title: One-click content
features.body: We fill headlines, benefits, FAQs and SEO snippets with AI.

features.title: Trusted layouts
features.body: Above-the-fold hero, social proof, sticky CTA and clear pricing.

features.title: SEO included
features.body: Schema, open graph, canonical, sitemap.xml and robots.txt.

testimonials.name: Maya R.
testimonials.quote: I picked 3 courses and had a store live in 15 minutes. My first sale was the same day!

faqs.a: You receive payouts directly from your payment provider for each sale.

faqs.q: Can I change my courses later?
